metadata.title: CVE-2022-25375 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in drivers/usb/gadget/function/rndis.c in the Linuxkernel before 5.16.10. The RNDIS USB gadget lacks validation of the size ofthe RNDIS_MSG_SET command. Attackers can obtain sensitive information fromkernel memory.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-25375` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.5.0-9-generic - 5.19.0-21.21
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-generic - 5.19.0-21.21
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-generic-64k - 5.19.0-21.21
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1008-aws - 5.19.0-1009.9
No subscription required
